name: @cycle/react-native
description: A Cycle.js Driver for interacting with React Native
author: Andre Staltz

scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
